item.title: New Year’s Python Meme 2012
item.author: Kwpolska
item.description:
Via Tarek Ziadé.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012-12-29-new-years-python-meme-2012.html

Forty Million is Nothing! Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012/12/02/forty-million-is-nothing/ 2012-12-02T17:00:00Z /blog/2012/12/02/forty-million-is-nothing/

I’ve been busy, but I now have time to write about it: in a bit over one month, Microsoft sold 40,000,000 licenses of Microsoft Windows. That is a little bit above, hmm, nothing.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012-12-02-forty-million-is-nothing.html

Sinofsky out Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012/11/14/sinofsky-out/ 2012-11-14T17:00:00Z /blog/2012/11/14/sinofsky-out/

Steven Sinofsky said goodbye to Microsoft on Monday. Who is he, may you ask? The guy that provided us with entertainment for the last few months here. He was responsible for creating this beautiful piece of shit that is Windows 8. So, he fucked shit up and quit. Marvellous.

So, bye Steve, and have fun fucking shit up somewhere else. Maybe Scheißung Samsung?

Read the Windows 8 Commentary by yours truly.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012-11-14-sinofsky-out.html

Windows 8 Commentary Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012/11/11/windows-8-commentary/ 2012-11-11T17:15:00Z /blog/2012/11/11/windows-8-commentary/

Windows 8 was released on 2012-10-26. That is, 16 days ago. Why am I writing about it now? Easy: because I did not even bother doing a review. This is just a bit of quick commentary.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012-11-11-windows-8-commentary.html

A Review of Windows 8 Release Preview. Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2012/06/03/a-review-of-windows-8-release-preview/ 2012-06-03T16:00:00Z /blog/2012/06/03/a-review-of-windows-8-release-preview/

Microsoft released Windows 8 Release Preview on Friday, June 1st. And I just wanted to start a game playthrough on Sunday. Wish me luck, as I want to do both ASAP. Here we go again!

Notice: Please read [A Look at Windows 8 Consumer Preview][w8cp] first.

As I said at the end of the logo rant, I reviewed Windows 8. The third part of the Twilight Windows 8 saga, and the biggest one. I am going to post more stuff about it in the future, but here it is: the Kwpolska Windows 8 Consumer Preview Review. Enjoy.

A New Engine… Again (And A Few Other Changes) Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011/10/20/a-new-engine-again/ 2011-10-20T21:00:00Z /blog/2011/10/20/a-new-engine-again/

Hello there. I have a few announcements for you.

First of, I changed the blog engine. It is now ran by Hyde, a port of Jekyll to Python (but improved).

Second of, all posts from 2009 were archived. If you are crazy and want to read them, see Archives/2009. They won’t be visible on the Blog page.

Third of, the URLs of posts were changed a bit, but they are fixed by the server.

Fourth of, the Projects page will get a little makeover soon.

That is all.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011-10-20-a-new-engine-again.html

A Trick For Hiding Your Mail Address Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011/02/11/a-trick-for-hiding-your-mail-address/ 2011-02-11T00:00:00Z /blog/2011/02/11/a-trick-for-hiding-your-mail-address/

Recently, Aza Raskin published a blog post about protecting your mail address with CSS. He uses some random CSS to make “randomness” look like “racmnFudZG9otbmmVnzcewsos” when you copy it. That’s nice, but I found a better way — the Kw’s Mail Hide Trick. See it for yourself.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011-02-11-a-trick-for-hiding-your-mail-address.html

HTML5 Transition Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011/01/22/html5-transition/ 2011-01-22T00:00:00Z /blog/2011/01/22/html5-transition/

Recently, the HTML5 logo was published. As W3C states, [i]t stands strong and true, resilient and universal as the markup you write. […] And it certainly doesn’t use tables for layout. The logo’s site presents you with many information about HTML5, the new possibilities and the new logo. Due to that, I decided to make use of HTML5. Right now, the blog is using the HTML5 semantics (header, footer, nav, article figure, figcaption) and CSS3 (border-radius, box-shadow, text-shadow). The CSS3 part is still in development.

Update: The CSS3 part is ready.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011-01-22-html5-transition.html

Arch Linux: The Best Linux Distro Ever. Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011/01/06/arch-linux-the-best-distro-ever/ 2011-01-06T00:00:00Z /blog/2011/01/06/arch-linux-the-best-distro-ever/

I’m using Linux since 2007. I’ve been on many distros (in order): Mandriva, Ubuntu, openSuSE, Fedora, and only in VirtualBox: Debian and Linux Mint. But since two months there is another distro in both lists (I tested it out on VirtualBox and then set it up on the actual machine): Arch Linux.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2011-01-06-arch-linux-the-best-distro-ever.html

Jekyll, Welcome Home. + OMG I WROTE SOMETHING Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/12/12/jekyll-welcome-home/ 2010-12-27T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/12/12/jekyll-welcome-home/

“Jekyll, Welcome Home.”, December 12th, 2010

The Kw’s Blog was redone. The old blog was run by WordPress, Constructor theme and XHTML posts. Now, I’m using Jekyll and Markdown posts. That’s better. All the content was imported and converted to Markdown (except for 3 posts, they are available in HTML forms). You can see a comparison of Jekyll and WordPress posts).

And even better: you can see “this” instead of "this" (currently only in this post, it will not be added into older ones).

“OMG I WROTE SOMETHING”, December 11th, 2010

This is a jekyll post. I can use Markdown. You cannot. And for the sake of it, I imported the old blog entries. I had to modify them A LOT. I hope everything will work fine.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-12-12-jekyll-welcome-home.html

Jekyll for Dummies Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/12/27/jekyll-for-dummies/ 2010-12-27T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/12/27/jekyll-for-dummies/

This post is an introduction to Jekyll, an awesome, simple, blog aware, static site generator. It’s a how-to helping you in setting up Jekyll.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-12-27-jekyll-for-dummies.html

bit.ly Pro - New Features for Website Owners Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/11/03/bit-ly-pro/ 2010-11-03T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/11/03/bit-ly-pro/

I just became a bit.ly Pro user - here’s some information about it.

The bit.ly URL shortener is known on most of the Internet. Bit.ly Pro (beta) is available for free. Bit.ly Enterprise costs $995/mo. The diferrence between the standard bit.ly and the pro version is an ability to track one domain and use your own URL (the blog uses kwpl.tk). The enterprise version adds tracking multiple domains, branding, suppport etc. (check the image for details). You can sign up for the Pro on bit.ly Products page. When you’ll qualify, you’ll receive a message about that.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-11-03-bit-ly-pro.html

Language change + Kw's Devel Site Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/10/02/language-change-kws-devel-site/ 2010-10-02T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/10/02/language-change-kws-devel-site/

A giant update: The Kw’s Devel Site is now dead.

Well, the blog is gonna end with Polish articles. It will be in English. The next thing is the Kw’s Devel Site, a place for all my development stuff. You can(not) visit it there: Kw’s Devel Site

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-10-02-language-change-kws-devel-site.html

Blog Day 2010 Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/08/31/blog-day-2010/ 2010-08-31T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/08/31/blog-day-2010/

Blog Day 2010, inicjatywa Nira Ofira, istnieje od 2005. Polega ona na wybraniu 5 blogerów i zarekomendowanie ich na swoim blogu. Bez zbędnych wstępów, moja lista:

  1. Niebezpiecznik.pl, założony w zeszłym roku, zajmuje się bezpieczeństwem IT.
  2. AntyWeb.pl, blog Grzegorza Hazana, startupy, startupy, startupy, i inne projekty sieciowe.
  3. MMOBlog.pl, blog Midvitha, jak sama nazwa wskazuje - MMO.
  4. OutsideWeb.info, blog Heroksa, apple, gry, IT i wszystko inne.
  5. PasswordIncorrect.com, dwujęzyczny blog Piotra Kowalczyka, eBooki i wszystko z nimi związane.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-08-31-blog-day-2010.html

Rest in Peace, Devilroot.pl Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/05/23/rip-devilroot-pl/ 2010-05-23T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/05/23/rip-devilroot-pl/

Dzisiaj nad ranem devilroot.pl został zamknięty. Powróci w formie płatnej. Płatnej Premium SMS-ami (o zgrozo, przecież wczoraj była o nich tu mowa!) Dodatkowe informacje znajdziecie za niedługo na http://devilroot.pl oraz w rozwinięciu postu.

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-05-23-rip-devilroot-pl.html

Oszustwa SMS Premium Kwpolska http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010/05/22/oszustwa-sms-premium/ 2010-05-22T00:00:00Z /blog/2010/05/22/oszustwa-sms-premium/

Kilka informacji o SMS Premium.

FOTKI NIE MA

1. Zawsze przeszukuj całą stronę

Rzecz najważniejsza. Informacja o prawdziwej kwocie jest schowana. Na zdjęciu obok widoczna jest kwota 1,22 PLN. Trochę niżej, małym fontem zaznaczona jest kwota 46,36 PLN. Różnica jest wielka.

2. Sprawdź nume Nie każdy publikuje te dane, nie każdemu chce się czytać bełkot. Dlatego numery SMS Premium są zbudowane według pewnego schematu. Poniżej tabela.

TABELKĘ UKRADLI. ALE JEST TUTAJ.

3. Drogie != dobre.
4. SOA #16: Google twoim przyjacielem

Wystarczy, że skorzystasz z Google. Może uda znaleźć Ci się tą zawartość za darmo?

Read more: http://kwpolska.tk/blog/2010-05-22-oszustwa-sms-premium.html
